sentences.english: Conclusion Tibetan compound prescription of XD shows certain therapeutic and preventive effect on plateau erythrocythemia.

sentences.english: Erythrocyte sedimentation rate was slow in perinatal newborn.
sentences.chinese: 而红细胞沉降率显著降低。

sentences.english: Conclusion We can break the host's specificity of Eperythrozoon.
sentences.chinese: 结论附红细胞体的宿主特异性可被打破。

sentences.english: Feeding transgenic Synechocystis did not induce the formation of micronucleus and other nuclear abnormalities in erythrocyte.
sentences.chinese: 转基因集胞藻对红细胞微核及核异常没有诱导作用。

sentences.english: Note the dark red congested regions that represent accumulation of RBC's in centrilobular regions.

sentences.english: Fibrous sepiolite has cytotoxicity to human erythrocyte.
sentences.chinese: 纤维海泡石对红细胞有毒性。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate a kind of modified reticulocyte staining solution.
sentences.chinese: 目的评价一种改良的网织红细胞染色液。

sentences.english: The effects of section of splanchnic nerves on the erythropoietic parameters has been investigated.
sentences.chinese: 本文观察了切除内脏大神经对红细胞参数的影响。

sentences.english: Conclusion:Erythropoietin can cure all varieties to premature infants with anemia effectively.
sentences.chinese: 结论红细胞生成素能有效地治疗各种早产儿贫血。

sentences.english: Objective:Introduce the application of erythropoietin to premature infants with anemia.
sentences.chinese: 目的介绍红细胞生成素在早产儿的应用。

sentences.english: Objective To Know the characteristic of erythrocyte in old diabetics at high altitude.
sentences.chinese: 目的了解高原地区老年糖尿病患者红细胞的变化特点。

sentences.english: The micronuclei rate of polychronatic. erythrocytes of mouse marrow were determined.
sentences.chinese: 测定小鼠骨髓嗜多染红细胞微核的出现率。

sentences.english: Now, the Duffy blood-group protein is essentially necessary for Plasmodium vivax to get into the red cell.
sentences.chinese: 现在间日疟原虫必须依靠达菲蛋白进入红细胞。

sentences.english: Conclusion The model of infection with eperythrozoon was established in mice.
sentences.chinese: 结论可以用小鼠建立附红细胞体感染动物模型。
